thama me thaththwayata paminiye wasara 12 k krida kirimen pasuwa bawada ohu kiya sitiyeya.engalanthaya daksha kandayamak bawath eheth owunata erehiwa thamange krida salasma pilibandawa thamata honda wishwasayak thibena bawath shri lanka nawa krikat nayakaya kiya sitiyeya.merata siti dakshathama pithikaruweku wana mawan athapaththu shri lanka kandayame pithikaruwange puhunukaru lesa path kirima thamatath, kandayamatath wishala shakthiyak bawada dilshan kiya sitiyeya.mayi 5 wanida wana wita perala shri lankawata paminennayi shri lanka krikat aayathanaya wisin ayi. pi. el. kridakayanta danumdima honda thiranayak bawath aayathanaya wisin ganu labana oonama thiranayakata kridakayan ekanga bawath ohu pawasiya.kane palandina karabuwa gana madhyawediyaku wisin nagana lada prashnayakata dilshan mese pilithuru dunne mada sinahawakin yuthuwaya.“mama mage kana widde mage loku duwage kana widda dawaseyi.

awashya karana wishesha yayi penunu kipa denekge paminimen pasu pirisa bana maduwe aatha kelawarehi daham pasal banku piliwelakata thaba raswimak pawathwannata sudanam wana bawa dakinata labini.meyata perada ma pamini pasu pansale mewani raswim dekak pamana pawathi athara eewa upasaka samithiye sil aththan mulika karagath eewa wu athara, ema raswim walata prathamawa aniwaryayenma pansale wada siti swamin wahanse hata arayum kirimak wini.namuth ada ewannak kerena patak dakinnata natha.math chandawimala himiyanuth siduwanne kumakdayi awadanayen bala sitiyemu.siyalu dena ekwa payaka pamana welawak yam kathikawaka yedenu daknata labini.
